title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining Market Insights: The Amazon Quick Research and FactSet Integration
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 重新构想市场洞察：Amazon Quick Research 与 FactSet 集成
abstract: In this lightning talk, discover how Amazon Quick Research brings together FactSet's trusted financial data—including equity prices, company financials, earnings call transcripts, and analyst estimates—with your organization's data and web search, all in one unified experience to dramatically accelerate research and analysis. We'll explore how business professionals can uncover breakthrough market insights in minutes instead of weeks, with full transparency and source verification. See how this powerful combination helps organizations turn time-consuming research into actionable insights they can rely on.
abstract_cn: 在这次闪电演讲中，了解 Amazon Quick Research 如何将 FactSet 值得信赖的金融数据——包括股票价格、公司财务、财报电话会议记录和分析师预测——与您组织的数据和网络搜索整合在一起，提供统一的体验，从而显著加速研究和分析。我们将探讨业务专业人士如何在几分钟而非几周内发现突破性的市场洞察，并具有完全的透明度和来源验证。了解这种强大的组合如何帮助组织将耗时的研究转化为可靠的可操作洞察。
